metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1029 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The puppetlabs-stdlib module 2.1 through 3.0 and 4.1.0 through 4.5.x before4.5.1 for Puppet 2.8.8 and earlier allows remote authenticated users togain privileges or obtain sensitive information by prepopulating the factcache.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1029` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

puppet-module-puppetlabs-stdlib - 4.10.0-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: puppet-module-puppetlabs-stdlib package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.10.0-1').
